entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bella Coola
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain changing to rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
